backend/main.mo: Defines core types for users, tasks, avatars, audit logs, and history, plus comparison helpers, while including blob storage mixin.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report placeholder with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of all frontend source files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes with layout-wide CSS tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint loading the React app with a rebuild‑trigger comment.
frontend/public/rebuild-trigger.txt: Stores timestamp and build version used to trigger frontend rebuilds.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app routing authentication, profile setup, and dashboard selection with defensive role checks and error boundary wrapper.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that catches runtime errors and displays a reload prompt.
frontend/src/components/AssistantDetailV: Manager view for a single assistant showing overtime totals, history, CSV export, and task habit metrics.
frontend/src/components/AssistantList.ts: Scrollable assistant list displaying profile avatars and overtime totals with selection support.
frontend/src/components/DangerZone.tsx: Provides a UI for wiping all stored data with confirmation, triggering a mutation, clearing caches, logging out, and reloading the app.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the app header with theme toggle, user profile controls, avatar modal, and logout logic that clears identity and cache.
frontend/src/components/ManagerAnalytics: Displays managers’ analytics with overtime totals per assistant, summary rows, and a team overtime bar chart using fetched overtime data.
frontend/src/components/OvertimeChart.ts: Generates a cumulative overtime trend chart (line or bar) by grouping and sorting entries, with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/OvertimeForm.tsx: Form for adding or using overtime with validation for minutes, date, and future dates, submitting via a callback.
Shows paginated, searchable overtime history with minutes formatting and allows editing only the latest entry through a mutation.
Displays a card summarizing overtime totals with loading skeletons and breakdown by days, hours, and minutes.
frontend/src/components/profile/AvatarMo: Modal for changing avatars, allowing image upload with validation or choosing from preset avatars.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileA: Renders a user avatar from a profile picture, preset image, or initials fallback with size options.
frontend/src/components/ProfileDialog.ts: Profile dialog showing user info, avatar, role, and an editable initials field with validation and save handling.
frontend/src/components/todo/AuditLogVie: Displays a searchable and filterable audit log of task actions with timestamps, action badges, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/todo/EvidenceIma: Dialog showing a full-size preview of an evidence photo for a task with a close button.
frontend/src/components/todo/MarkTaskDon: Dialog for marking a task done, allowing optional comment and photo upload before submission.
frontend/src/components/todo/TaskComplet: Shows who completed a task using their profile avatar and initials or username.
Provides UI for selecting or capturing a photo to attach to task completion, including validation and camera handling.
frontend/src/components/todo/TaskLedgerD: Displays a dialog showing a task's audit history with timestamps, actions, and evidence photo preview support.
frontend/src/components/todo/TaskPrefere: Allows selecting an assistant and managing their task preference settings with update actions and visual indicators.
frontend/src/components/todo/ToDoSection: Main task management section handling listing, searching, creating, editing, deleting, and marking tasks as done.
frontend/src/components/todo/ToDoTable.t: Renders the task list table with urgency indicators, actions, history viewing, and evidence photo preview functionality.
frontend/src/components/todo/ToDoTaskDia: React dialog for creating, editing, validating, and deleting to-do tasks with frequency selection and form state handling.
frontend/src/constants/dentalPresets.ts: Defines 24 dental-themed preset avatar metadata and a helper to retrieve preset info by ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, avatars, tasks, and related backend data.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Hook for managing light, dark, and system themes with persistence and auto-updating based on system settings.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables defining light and dark theme colors for the dental UI design.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with react-query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AssistantDashboard.ts: Renders the assistant dashboard with tabs for to‑dos and overtime, pulling overtime data and allowing logging of hours.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Displays the login screen and triggers Internet Identity authentication with a styled UI.
frontend/src/pages/ManagerDashboard.tsx: Provides the manager dashboard with tabs for to‑dos, team management, analytics, audit logs, and settings, including assistant deletion.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSetupPage.tsx: Shows a profile setup form for new users to register username, initials, and language, then submits via registerAssistant.
frontend/src/utils/externalBlobUrl.ts: Generates a URL for an ExternalBlob using a direct link or a Blob fallback.
frontend/src/utils/overtimeDates.ts: Contains date utilities for formatting overtime dates, getting today's local date, and checking for future dates.
frontend/src/utils/overtimeStyles.ts: Returns a CSS class for overtime cells based on whether time was added or used.
frontend/src/utils/photoValidation.ts: Validates uploaded photos by checking file type and size against JPEG/PNG and 6MB limits.
frontend/src/utils/presetTileColors.ts: Provides deterministic accent color sets for avatar tile presets based on ID.
frontend/src/utils/taskHabits.ts: Computes on‑time metrics, formats task completion history, and provides helpers for frequency, timestamps, and preference labels/colors.
frontend/src/utils/todoDates.ts: Functions to compute task due dates, labels, urgency scores, and workday-based scheduling for daily, weekly, and monthly tasks.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning parameters from URL hashes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, radii, animations, and shadows with custom design tokens.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, planned features, and requirements for implementing a backend wipe/reset and first-user manager assignment.
